author: andschwa
body:
Resolves #1431.
- The `GetCharFromConsoleKey` functionality was removed as it was unneeded.
- `TryParseCharLiteral` was implemented for Linux (borrowing from CoreFX)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Problem on Windows: some keys like ] show as Oem6.

title: Fix PSReadLine keybindings
